thread.title: N.J.'s Karl-Anthony Towns trolled by Wisconsin fans in preseason game
thread.title_full: N.J.'s Karl-Anthony Towns trolled by Wisconsin fans in preseason game

author: Jeremy Schneider | NJ Advance Media For NJ.com
title: N.J.'s Karl-Anthony Towns trolled by Wisconsin fans in preseason game
text:
New Jersey native Karl-Anthony Towns was on the court for 38 victories at Kentucky, and he just one loss . That loss came at the hands of Wisconsin in the Final Four, and Badger fans were sure to remind the No. 1 overall pick of that last night . 
The Minnesota Timberwolves faced off with the Milwaukee Bucks in a preseason game at the Kohl Center in Madison, Wis., on Tuesday night, home of the Wisconsin Badgers. The home crowd chanted "38-1" at Towns, a reminder of his record while a Wildcat. Fans here yelling "38-1" at Karl-Anthony Towns. Well, that's not very nice. — Kyle Ratke (@Kyle_Ratke) October 21, 2015 
Towns finished with six points and six rebounds in a 106-88 loss, but has looked solid for the Timberwolves in the preseason. He's also on the cover of Sports Illustrated this week. I already texted @KarlTowns and told him it doesn't make our @SInow wall. #WrongUni pic.twitter.com/eRSvtaIVfq — John Calipari (@UKCoachCalipari) October 20, 2015 
Jeremy Schneider may be reached at jschneider@njadvancemedia.com . Follow him on Twitter @J_Schneider . Find NJ.com on Facebook .
